msContents.summary: Only 1 page which represents the entirety of chapter 1 is extant.
msContents.textLang: The document is written in English with scattered short French passages with which to demonstrate the use of xml:lang

msItemStruct.filiation: This text is a hand transcription of our basic encoding slide with some minor, but deliberate, changes by the author to make it more suitable for teaching manuscript encoding.
msItemStruct.note:
The filiation element is really supposed to be about the relationship of this manuscript to surviving manuscripts of the same text
.

supportDesc.support: standard US copy machine paper, white
supportDesc.extent: The original is 1 page, which has fewer than 750 characters
supportDesc.foliation: There is no page numbering or other sequencing information
supportDesc.condition: Deliberately damaged with 2 coffee stains near the bottom of the written portion of the page. One is light, through which text can easily be seen, the other is dark and obscures the underlying text somewhat.

handDesc.summary: Written in two contemporary hands, although that of the major contributor is occasionally in blue ink.

physDesc.accMat: This sample is included as part of the WWP presentation on basic MS encoding.
